other_tests.findings: Initial CD4 cell count was 20 cells/mL; later CD4 cell count rebounded to 1300 cells/mL after treatment; 318 cells/mL in September 2004; 26 cells/mL on admission.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Decreased from 318 cells/mL to 26 cells/mL after stopping antiretroviral therapy; rebounded to 294 cells/mL after resuming treatment.

other_tests.findings: HIV RNA level was 1100,000 copies/mL at hospitalization in 1999; stably suppressed below detectable levels (!75 copies/mL) for 11 years; 1500,000 copies/mL on admission.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Increased from !75 copies/mL to 1500,000 copies/mL after stopping therapy; returned to !75 copies/mL after resuming therapy.

other_tests.findings: Presence of anticardiolipin antibody and a low protein S level (56%; normal range is 70%-134%).
